arts.ttl: Fermin Lopez creates UCL history as Barca hit 10-man Olympiacos for six
arts.sum: Barcelona attacker Fermin Lopez scores his first career hat-trick, alongside a Marcus Rashford brace, to fire Hansi Flick's side to a 6-1 victory over 10-man Olympiacos in the Champions League league phase.

arts.ttl: Barcelona gem achieves special milestone on Champions League debut in 6-1 win vs Olympiacos
arts.sum: Barcelona wonderkid Pedro ‘Dro’ Fernandez made his UEFA Champions League debut today, starting on the left wing against Olympiacos at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys in Montjuic. arts.sum: The La Liga champions ran riot after Olympiacos were reduced to 10 men in the second half.

arts.ttl: Fermin 10, Rashford 9 | Barcelona 6-1 Olympiacos: Player ratings
arts.sum: Barcelona’s third European fixture of the season saw them lock horns with Greek outfit Olympiacos at the Estadi Olimpic de Lluis Companys and the Catalans took home all three points to keep the momentum ahead of the first Clásico of the season.
